attributes.action: Immediately remove illegal migrants.  And use the navy to block the crossing.
attributes.additional_details: There is a invasion happening in the UK every week . Of all military aged males border skipping through save European nations to take advantage of the UKs hard earned and built welfare systems. This was never voted for . And if anything the success of Brexit proves the people don’t want this globalist agenda .
attributes.background: The Government need to rapidly remove illegal migrants and send them back to the continent . And use what navy vessels are in port to block the crossings .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744

The Government already has a policy of removing people who are not legally entitled to be in the UK.
